title: Show Me The Meaning Of Being Lonely
lyrics:
[intro]
(Gm)Show me the meaning of (Eb)being (F)lonely
(Gm) (Eb) (F)
 
(Gm) So many words for the (Eb)broken (F)heart
(Gm) It's hard to see in a (Eb)crimson (F)love
So (F)hard to (Eb)breathe
(Eb)Walk with (D)me
And maybe...
 
(Gm) Nights of light so (Eb)soon be(F)come
(Gm) Wild and free I could (Eb)feel the (F)sun
Your (F)every (Eb)wish... (Eb)will be (D)done
They tell me...
 
[chorus]
(Gm) Show me the meaning of (Eb)being (F)lonely
(Gm) Is this the feeling I (Eb)need to (F)walk with
(Bb) Tell me why I (D)can't be there where you (Gm)are
There's (Eb)something missing (F) in my heart
 
[interlude] (Gm) (Eb) (F)
 
(Gm) Life goes on as it (Eb)never (F)ends
(Gm) Eyes of stone ob(Eb)serve the (F)trends
They (F)never (Eb)say for(Eb)ever (D)gaze upon me
 
(Gm) Guilty roads to an (Eb)endless (F)love
(Gm) There's no control
Are you (Eb)with me (F)now
Your (F)every (Eb)wish... (Eb)will be (D)done
They tell me
 
[chorus]
(Gm) Show me the meaning of (Eb)being (F)lonely
(Gm) Is this the feeling I (Eb)need to (F)walk with
(Bb) Tell me why I (D)can't be there where you (Gm)are
There's (Eb)something missing (F)in my...
 
[bridge]
(Am)Heart...  There's nowhere to run
(F) I have no (G) place to go
(Am) Surrender my heart, (F) body (G) and (C)soul
How can it be you're asking (E)me to feel
The things you never (Am)show
(F)Ooooh  (G)  (Am) 
[down strums] (F) (F-stop)  (G) (G-stop)
 
[interlude, kazoo]
| (Am) | (F)  (G) |
| (Am) | (F) (You are (G)missing in my heart !)
| (C) | (E) | (Am)
Tell me (F)why I can't be (G)there where you are
 
[chorus]
(Am) Show me the meaning of (F)being (G)lonely
(Am) Is this the feeling I (F)need to (G)walk with
(C) Tell me why I (E)can't be there where you (Am)are
There's (F)something missing (G)in my heart
 
[chorus again!]
(Am) Show me the meaning of (F)being (G)lonely
(Am) Is this the feeling I (F)need to (G)walk with
(C) Tell me why I (E)can't be there where you (Am)are
There's (F)something missing (G)in my... (Am)heart [end]
